survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients regarding their satisfaction with healthcare providers, focusing on aspects such as communication, treatment effectiveness, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by your healthcare provider?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by your healthcare provider?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your healthcare experience met your expectations? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse patient experiences.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your healthcare experience met your expectations? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific positive experiences you had with your healthcare provider.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Satisfied' or 'Very satisfied' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide valuable qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific positive experiences you had with your healthcare provider.
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Satisfied' or 'Very satisfied' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your healthcare experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed feedback to identify areas for improvement.
